import { MoreVert } from "@mui/icons-material"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Post.css"; import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; const Post = ({ post }) => { const [like, setLike ] = useState(0) const [isLike, setIsLike] = useState return (
user.id === post.id)[0].profilePicture} alt="" className="postProfileImage" /> {Users.filter((user) => user.id === post.id)[0].username} {post.date}
{post.desc}
{like}人いいねをしました
{post.comment}:コメント
); }; export default Post;
